summary: Resolved conflicts in .claude-resolution.json and .conflict-info.json. Both are CI/CD workflow metadata files generated per merge attempt. The .conflict-info.json file had no conflict markers and was staged as-is. The .claude-resolution.json conflict was between two stale AI-generated summaries from prior merge runs; replaced with current resolution metadata reflecting this session.
strategyUsed: replaced conflicted metadata files with correct current-context values â€” .conflict-info.json was already clean and staged as-is; .claude-resolution.json conflict markers were removed and the file was rewritten to reflect this resolution session
